title: How to Bake Bramley Apples

steps.headline: Choose Bramley apples that are of a similar size.
steps.description: This ensures that they won't bake at a different pace.

steps.headline: Wash the apples.
steps.description: Dry with a clean cloth or paper towel.

steps.headline: Core each Bramley apple.
steps.description: Use either an apple corer or a sharp knife. Widen the hole to about halfway with a sharp knife.

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 190ºC/350ºF.
steps.description: Line a baking tray with baking paper.

steps.headline: Mix the filling.
steps.description: Put the sugar, sultanas/raisins and cinnamon into a bowl and stir together.

steps.headline: Spoon even amounts of the filling into each of the four apples.
Arrange across the lined baking tray.
Add a small amount of butter to the top of each stuffed Bramley apple.
Place in the preheated oven.
steps.description: Bake for half an hour to 40 minutes, or until done. The nature of this apple is to break down a lot when cooked, so when it's soft, it is ready for eating.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven.
steps.description: Serve immediately. Add cream, ice cream or another favorite sweet condiment.

text: Choose Bramley apples that are of a similar size. This ensures that they won't bake at a different pace. Wash the apples. Dry with a clean cloth or paper towel. Core each Bramley apple. Use either an apple corer or a sharp knife. Widen the hole to about halfway with a sharp knife. Preheat the oven to 190ºC/350ºF. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Mix the filling. Put the sugar, sultanas/raisins and cinnamon into a bowl and stir together. Spoon even amounts of the filling into each of the four apples.  Arrange across the lined baking tray. The apples should sit upright. Add a small amount of butter to the top of each stuffed Bramley apple.  Place in the preheated oven. Bake for half an hour to 40 minutes, or until done. The nature of this apple is to break down a lot when cooked, so when it's soft, it is ready for eating. Remove from the oven. Serve immediately. Add cream, ice cream or another favorite sweet condiment.
